name: Bowly Guacamole
description:
A game slapped I together in 2 hours for the shenanijam by Butterscotch Shenanigans (notice how i used the word 'slapped' to attract the bscotch shenanigans team since they seem to use that word a lot). The theme i went with was Hold the guac

Protect your bowl of guacamole by pocking it with a stick! Poke your physics defying bowl out of harms way for as long as possible! 

Featuring - very rushed gameplay, artwork done by a programmer, a bowl of very stale guacamole, and much more! (disclaimer - doesn't actually feature much more)

Up and down arrows / W & S to move your poking stick

Credits:

Straw Fields by Role music - http://freemusicarchive.org/mu...
